org.workflowsim.failure

Class FailureMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.workflowsim.failure.FailureMonitor

  • public class FailureMonitor
extends java.lang.Object
    FailureMonitor collects failure information
    Since:
    WorkflowSim Toolkit 1.0
